scripts.install: npm run install-microservices && npm run install-apps
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-auth" "npm run dev-ticket" "npm run dev-vehicle" "npm run dev-permit" "npm run dev-lot" "npm run dev-app" "npm run dev-stripe" "npm run dev-ocr" "npm run dev-webhook"
scripts.dev-enforcement: concurrently "npm run dev-auth" "npm run dev-ticket" "npm run dev-vehicle" "npm run dev-permit" "npm run dev-lot" "npm run dev-app-enforcement"  "npm run dev-ocr"
scripts.dev-admin: concurrently "npm run dev-auth" "npm run dev-ticket" "npm run dev-vehicle" "npm run dev-permit" "npm run dev-lot" "npm run dev-app-admin"
scripts.postgres: docker exec -it virtual-park-db psql -U postgres -d dev
